item.title: The Clovis Republic
item.description: The Clovis Concord, the merchant republic along the Menagerie Coast, has shifted from a Merchant Republic to a full republican nation.

item.title: The Dwendalian Empire
item.description: The area to the immediate south-west of Rexxentrum has been entirely destroyed. The crater that resulted from the impact of one of Chioneâ€™s icicles filled with its molten water and became a lake named Sterbeloch that quickly formed a natural egress to Erdeloch.
